document_name: Latvia's strategy to achieve climate by 2050 by 2050
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/LVA/2019/LVA-2019-01-01-Latvia's strategy to achieve climate by 2050 by 2050_624dc3ac2aa82dd5807a4932b03713de.pdf
document_description: The Strategy is a long-term policy planning document designed to increase the economic competitiveness of the Latvian economy at the same time as limiting and reducing climate change, as well as to ensure a safe living environment for the people of Latvia. It is designed to support the European Union's overall climate-neutrality target by 2050. This document was released alongside the National Energy and Climate Plan 2021-2030 that is a mandatory communication to the EU.The document details the government's overarching goals and lines of action, examines and sets the emissions reduction low-carbon objectives across the economy's main sectors.
